CdrDoc.CdrDocXml: <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output method="xml"/> <xsl:template match="node()|@*"> <xsl:copy> <!-- Testing filter promotion. --> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*"/> <xsl:apply-templates/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:transform>
